DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the drug-durg interaction between ambroxol and levodropropizine.
DOC.brief_title: A Drug-Drug Interaction Study of Ambroxol and Levodropropizine
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age between 20 and 55 Signed informed consent Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients Hypotension or hypertension Has a history of acute infection within 14 days of screening
